author: Amanda Ferguson
title: Coronavirus: Six more deaths in North as sweeping powers come into force
description: Further 86 cases of Covid-19 reported following announcement of restrictions
content:
Six more people have died from coronavirus in Northern Ireland in the last 24 hours, the Public Health Agency said on Sunday.
It reported a further 86 cases of the virus, also known as Covid-19, bringing the total in the region to 410. Twenty-one people have… [+5136 chars]
